account_identifier.description: The identifier for the platform account to fund.

client_ip.description: The IP address of the person making the purchase.

credit_card.description: Details of the credit card being used to fund the account.

number.description: The credit card number, preferably numbers only.

expiration.description: The expiration date of the credit card in YYYY-MM format.

security_code.description: The 3 or 4-digit card security code (CVV2, CVC2, or CID).

billing_address.description: The billing address associated with the credit card.

f_name.description: The first name associated with the customer's billing address.

l_name.description: The last name associated with the customer's billing address.

address.description: The billing address. For multi-line addresses append subsequent lines to the first.

city.description: The city of the customer's billing address.

state.description: The state of the customer's billing address. Up to 40 characters (no symbols) or a FIPS state alpha code (e.g. AL, WA, etc).

zip.description: The postal code of the customer's billing address.

country.description: The country of the customer's billing address.
